citations.narrative:
On August 2, 2023, a search inspection was completed. The USDA inspector contacted the facility owner via phone upon
arrival at the facility to discuss the disposition of a female wallaby. The facility owner stated they sold the female wallaby
in March 2023, no longer keeping as a pet. This is regulated activity under the Animal Welfare Act, as the facility has been
operating as a dealer without a valid USDA license.
A USDA license application packet was sent to the facility along with this report.
No regulated activity is permitted until a USDA license is obtained to operate as a dealer, exhibitor, or operator of an
auction or sale.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.1(a)(1) 
   
Requirements and application. 
On August 2, 2023, a search inspection was completed. The USDA inspector contacted the facility owner via phone upon 
arrival at the facility to discuss the disposition of a female wallaby. The facility owner stated they sold the female wallaby 
in March 2023, no longer keeping as a pet. This is regulated activity under the Animal Welfare Act, as the facility has been 
operating as a dealer without a valid USDA license. 
A USDA license application packet was sent to the facility along with this report.  
No regulated activity is permitted until a USDA license is obtained to operate as a dealer, exhibitor, or operator of an 
auction or sale. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
